item.title: Unboxing and Testing the i450 Arc Spray
item.description: The i450 Arc Spray gets unboxed and put to the test. See how it performs in real workshop conditions.

media:content.media:title: Unboxing and Testing the i450 Arc Spray
media:content.media:description: The i450 Arc Spray gets unboxed and put to the test. See how it performs in real workshop conditions.

item.title: Engineering ASMR in the Workshop
item.description: Smooth cuts, clean passes, and satisfying machining sounds. This is engineering ASMR at its finest.

item.title: Cutting Headlight Clearance Holes with Oxy‑Acetylene
item.description: Kurtis fires up the oxy‑acetylene torch to cut the headlight clearance holes. A clean, controlled cut shows real skill in action.

item.title: Heat, Muscle, and a Milling Machine
item.description: Sometimes repairs take creativity — a bit of heat, some muscle, and a trip to the mill. See how persistence wins the fight in the workshop.

item.title: Hitachi EH4000 Track Rod Overhaul
item.description: A worn track rod from a Hitachi EH4000 gets a full overhaul. Precision machining and engineering skill bring this massive component back to life.

item.title: Repairing the CAT 637 Scraper
item.description: his CAT 637 scraper is ready for some serious attention. Watch the repair process as the crew tackles the heavy‑duty work needed to get it running strong again.

item.title: CAT D11 Ripper Shank Repair
item.description: Heavy equipment repair in action as the CAT D11 dozer’s ripper shank gets restored.

item.title: Hydraulic Cylinder Barrel Repair | Part 1
item.description: The first stage of making a new barrel for a hydraulic cylinder repair project.

item.title: D10 Track Adjuster Sleeve Fit
item.description: Precision heat and careful alignment bring the new sleeve into place on the D10 track adjuster cannon.

item.title: Completely broken to brand-new
item.description: A full repair process that takes a damaged component and restores it to like-new condition. What steps make the difference between failure and a flawless finish?

item.title: DIY Boring Bar Build
item.description: A scrap cylinder rod is transformed into a big boring bar using lathe skills.

item.title: Dozer Equalizer Bar Restoration
item.description: Watch the process of repairing and restoring a worn‑out dozer equalizer bar.

item.title: Cylinder Gland Seal Kit Install
item.description: Step‑by‑step installation of a new seal kit on a hydraulic cylinder gland.

item.title: The ultimate test for our milling & drilling attachment
item.description: Putting a milling and drilling attachment through its paces under real workshop conditions. Does it hold up when precision truly matters?

item.title: Repairing a CAT bore for a new pin
item.description: Damaged bores are machined, welded, and finished to exact tolerances. How do repairs like this extend the life of heavy equipment?

item.title: Making a new trunnion for a D11T bulldozer
item.description: Machining a brand-new trunnion for a massive D11T bulldozer. What challenges come with components built on this scale?

item.title: From steel ring to final drive motor part
item.description: Transforming raw steel into a precision excavator final drive motor component. What goes into machining parts that handle extreme loads?

item.title: Replacing damaged soil compactor wheel caps
item.description: Worn and damaged wheel caps get replaced to restore proper function. How do small components protect massive machines?

item.title: Fractured cast iron transmission housing repaired
item.description: A damaged cast iron transmission housing gets a second life through careful repair and machining. What does it take to restore strength and alignment to cast iron?

item.title: Custom boring bar for hard-to-reach gear faces
item.description: Designing and machining a custom boring bar to reach difficult gear faces. When standard tools won’t work, custom solutions step in.
